main event: A civilian reported observing a UFO in Brownsville, Texas on May 16, 1964, that started moving slowly and then disappeared to the South after a duration of 10 to 20 minutes.
interesting points: The observation was made via ground radar,The course of the object was towards the NE, Mr. LT. and his wife confirmed seeing the object for approximately 20 minutes, The object appeared star-like in shape and color but was stationary at first, The sighting was reported to U.S. Air Force personnel after the incident.
witness description: Mr. LT., a 20-year-old Airman, and his 42-year-old wife.
